description: Standing near the railing, the entire ground level of the showroom can be viewed from this vantage point of the gallery.  A wide curving staircase leads back down to the main floor.  Emanating from the iridescent, domed skylight above, pale moonlight creates a rainbow of cascading colors.  Streaks of colors rain down over an antique thanot wood cabinet containing a few brawling weapons set securely behind heavy, etched glass doors.

Standing near the railing, the entire ground level of the showroom can be viewed from this vantage point of the gallery.  A wide curving staircase leads back down to the main floor.  Emanating from the iridescent, domed skylight above, golden sunlight creates a rainbow of cascading colors.  Streaks of colors rain down over an antique thanot wood cabinet containing a few brawling weapons set securely behind heavy, etched glass doors.
title: [Museum, Balcony]
